+++
title = 'Donations'
+++

## You like our work? Make a donation to support our work!

<p>grml is, as every other Open-Source project, driven by the many
contributions made by many developers. <a href="/team/">The grml-team</a>
spends a great deal of their time and money toward this project.</p>

<p>If you have been using grml you will come to remember how much
money you or your company saves by using it or how you have been
supported via the <a href="/mailinglist/">project mailing list</a>,
<a href="/contact/">personal mail</a> or <a
  href="/irc/">irc</a>.</p>

<p>Now <strong>you</strong> can contribute by donating to grml. Your
donation could either be money or hardware that one of the developers or
the project as a whole needs. A donation would enable us to either
support a specific hardware/software either at all or simply better and
to spend more time on developing.</p>

<p>We, the grml developers, would therefore very much appreciate
every help from you as a 'Thank you' for our commitment to this
project.</p>

<p>But please do <em>not</em> donate if you are either poor, a
student, a teacher or a non-profit organisation.</p>

<p>Please contact Michael Prokop &lt;mika(at)grml.org&gt; for
assistance or for any questions that you might have. Your
contribution is very much appreciated!</p>

<p>Thank you!<br /><strong>The grml Project</strong></p>

### <a name="paypal"></a>Donate via PayPal

<p>One way to donate to grml is by using our PayPal account. We
suggest a donation of 100, 50 or 20 Euro, but you may donate any amount
you please by filling the amount in the formular you get when clicking on
the button below:</p>

<form action="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr" method="post">
<input type="hidden" name="cmd" value="_s-xclick">
<input type="image" src="https://www.paypal.com/de_DE/i/btn/x-click-but04.gif" border="0" name="submit" alt="Zahlen Sie mit PayPal - schnell, kostenlos und sicher!">
<img alt="" border="0" src="https://www.paypal.com/de_DE/i/scr/pixel.gif" width="1" height="1">
<input type="hidden" name="encrypted" value="-----BEGIN PKCS7----------END PKCS7-----
">
</form>

<form action="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr" method="post">
<input type="hidden" name="cmd" value="_s-xclick">
<input type="image" src="https://www.paypal.com/en_US/i/btn/x-click-but04.gif" border="0" name="submit" alt="Zahlen Sie mit PayPal - schnell, kostenlos und sicher!">
<img alt="" border="0" src="https://www.paypal.com/de_DE/i/scr/pixel.gif" width="1" height="1">
<input type="hidden" name="encrypted" value="-----BEGIN PKCS7----------END PKCS7-----
">
</form>

<p>Notice: the provided information is required by PayPal to do the money
transaction and is not required by or visible to the grml-team.</p>

### <a name="money"></a>Money Transfer

<p>From Europe, you may remit your donation to us without using Paypal.
Since July 2003 new EU regulations apply for cross-border transfers in
euros and the fees charged by banks for such transactions may no longer
exceed the fees that apply to domestic transfers. If you want to donate
money to the grml team this way <a href="/contact/">contact us</a> to
receive information regarding the account.</p>

### <a name="hardware"></a>Hardware which would help the grml-team

<ul>
  <li>ppc system (for ppc port)</li>
  <li>build server</li>
  <li>all kind of hardware for use with <a
  href="/kernel/#modules">the extra modules of the grml-kernel</a></li>
</ul>

<p>Any other kind of hardware is welcome too of course. Please <a
href="/contact/">contact us</a> if you would like to donate hardware.</p>
